eng: Besides, with the sun setting, it's the perfect time to run into a wolf or a bear!
darija_ar: عاد زيد, معا لغوروب, وقت ميتالي باش نتساطحو معا شي ديب أُلا دوبّ!
transl: Come on, let's go for a walk, it's the perfect time to relax together and unwind!

eng: I tend to snack on things like crisps and biscuits which I know are not very good for me
darija_ar: مولّف كانخطف شي لعيبات بحال شيپس أُلا بيمووات اللي كانعرف أناهوم مامزيانينش ليا
transl: The coach kidnapped some players like chips, or they disappeared, I don't know what happened to them.

eng: Well, let's not forget to do a bit of sports in the week to eliminate all this.
darija_ar: موهيم, خلّينا مانّساوش نديرو شويا ت الرياضا فوست السيمانا باش نحيّدو هادشي كولّو.
transl: Sure, let's not forget to do some sports this week so we can burn off all of this.

eng: I did what you asked for, boss, but I didn't pay attention to the time and I let it burn...
darija_ar: درت داكشي لي ڭلتي ليا أشف, والاكين ماردّيتش لبال اللوقت أُ خليتو إتحرڭ
transl: I did what you asked me to do, but he didn't respond at the time I left it for him.

eng: But, you know, my schedule is absolutely full, I never have time to deal with these practical details.
darija_ar: والاكين, راك عارف, لوقت ديالي عامر, ماكايكونش عندي لوقت باش نقابل هاد تافاسّيل
transl: Otherwise, you know, my schedule is full, I won't have time to meet this week.

eng: You can ask all the questions that will be left after your studying this weekend.
darija_ar: يمكن ليك تسوول ڭاع ل أسإلا لي بقاو مورا ماتقرا هاد ل ويكند
transl: Maybe you can ask those who are still here about what they did this weekend.

eng: Especially for next week, I need you to do a presentation on your favorite subject:
darija_ar: خوصوصان سيمانا جايا, محتاجك ديري واحد ل پرزنتاصيون علا لماوضوع اللي عزيز عليك.
transl: Especially next week, you need to do a presentation on the topic that is dear to you.

eng: I appreciate your advice, but I remind you that I'm the teacher, and you're the student.
darija_ar: كانقضّر الناسيحا ديالك, والاكين كانفكرك أنّاهو أنا هووا لوستاد, أُ نتا هووا تيلميد.
transl: I value your advice, but if you think I am the one who is lost, you are the student.

eng: But do you guys have any activities where you're all together: Walk, board games, shows...?
darija_ar: والاكين واش عندكوم شي ناشاطات لي كاتكونو فيهوم مجموعين: لا مارسه, ألعاب, موسلسالات...?
transl: Do you have any group activities like hiking, games, or picnics?

eng: Even if the staff is strict, for security reasons, you still get along well with them?
darija_ar: واخا ناسّ اللي خدّامين هنا مزييرين, علا قبل سيكيريتي, كاتبقا عالاقتك معاهوم مزيانا?
transl: Even though the people working here are very busy, do you find their interaction with you good?

eng: I thik the cook thinks everybody has dodgy false teeth or even no teeth at all
darija_ar: كانضن أنّا طبّاخا كايبان ليها كولشي إمّا مركّب لفوم إمّا ماعندوش السنان ڭاع
transl: They think we're chefs who can cook anything, either a foam structure or without teeth.

eng: I was apprehensive about moving here from my old house, but I have settled in now.
darija_ar: فلوول ماكنتش باغي نخرج من داري لقديما أُ نجي لهنا, والاكين ولّفت دابا.
transl: I didn't want to leave my house at all, but I had to come here, and now I'm lost.

eng: Yes, I'm just passing through this town for a work meeting.
darija_ar: أيه, أنا غي دايز من هاد لمدينا علا قبل شي جتيماع ديال لخدما.
transl: Yes, I will be absent from this meeting due to a work commitment.

eng: But the reality is bit less romantic - it's mostly deafness, forgetfulness, and aches and pains.
darija_ar: والاكين لحاقيقا أقال رومانسيا - فيها تسماك, نسيان, أُ صداع أُ ل ألام.
transl: But in reality, love is a mixture of fish, forgetting, echoes, and pain.

eng: After our game maybe we should both have a drink and try to sleep
darija_ar: مورا الطرح ديال لكارتا كايبان ليا نمشيو نشربو شي حاجا أُ نحاولو النعسو
transl: After the math problem, it seems like we should go out and have something to drink before we try to sleep.

eng: Then I promise to leave you alone and we will go for a shorter walk tomorrow.
darija_ar: أُ من بعد كانواعدك أنخلّيك علا راحتك أُ نمشيو غدّا نتمشّاو غير شويا.
transl: After they have made plans with you, I will let you go at your ease, we will go out for a walk tomorrow.

eng: But once again, when you want to do different things, you end up doing whatever you want.
darija_ar: أُ مرّا خرا, فاش تبغي الدير حاجات مختالفين, كاتلقا راسك كادّير اللي بغيتي.
transl: She's so stubborn, when you want to do things differently, she finds herself doing what you wanted.

eng: Honey, it's your birthday in exactly two months, we have to throw a party, what do you think?
darija_ar: حبيبا, عيد ميلادك من دابا شهراين, خاصنا نديرو شي حفلا, أش بان ليك?
transl: My dear, your birthday is in two months, should we throw a party, what do you think?

eng: What are you thinking I should be able to climb twenty floors because I m so fit?
darija_ar: أش بانليك واش أنا خاسني نكون قادر نتلاع عشرين تابقا حيت أنا صحيح?
transl: What do you think, am I losing my mind to be able to read your thoughts because I am right?

eng: I always have some leftover bread and I like to come here and enjoy the quiet.
darija_ar: عندي ديما شوييا ديال لخوبز ليكايبقا أُعزيز عليا نجي لهنا أُ نتماتاع بلهودوء.
transl: I always have a little bit of bread left that I cherish, so I can enjoy it with tea.

eng: Right I'll do that and then I need to serve the customer who has just come in.
darija_ar: واخا غادي نديرو أُ مان باعد غادي نحتاج نسربي لكليان اللي يالاه جا.
transl: And if we decide to go out, we will need to reserve a table at the restaurant in advance.

eng: We could try to find a pond, but I bet we'd get eaten alive by mosquitos.
darija_ar: إمكن لينا نحاولو نلقاو شي ضايا, والاكين نتحاطّو غادي ياكلنا الناموس أُحنا حيّين.
transl: We can try to find a solution, otherwise the mosquitoes will eat us alive.

eng: Or do you want to take advantage of the situation to have a good time together and without aggression?
darija_ar: أُلا بغيتي تاستافاد من لماوقيف باش تدوّز واقت مازيان معا بعضياتنا أُبلا إعتيداء
transl: If you want to benefit from the situation to pass and improve with our colleagues without any harm.

eng: It's more of a pub than a bar, but you should be able to book a space
darija_ar: هاداك ديسكو كتر من بار, والاكين خسّك تكون قادر ت رسرڤي شي بلاصا
transl: That disco is more like a bar, so if you want to reserve a spot, hurry up.

eng: There will be ten clients, who booked for tonight, at twenty o'clock.
darija_ar: غادي إكونو عشرا ديال لكليان اللي رسرڤاو هاد الليلا معا تمنيا تليل واقفا.
transl: There will be ten dishes reserved for those who booked tonight with a standing ovation.

eng: We explored the volcanoes on the island, lay on the beach and enjoyed the sunsets.
darija_ar: أُ ستاكشفنا لباراكين ف لجازيرا, تكّينا ف راملا ديال لبحار أُتماتاعنا بلغوروب .
transl: We discovered some ruins on the island, then we went to the beach to enjoy the sunset.

eng: Living this kind of experience alone, especially child, is not very pleasant.
darija_ar: باش تعيش هاد ناوع ديال تاجريبا بوحدك, خوسوسان كا درّي سغير, مازوينش بزاف
transl: Living this kind of experience alone can be a bit scary, so it's better not to rush into it.

eng: He asked me to say hello and tell you he'll be here by Tuesday if he can
darija_ar: ڭالّيا نسلّم عليك أُ نڭوليك بيلا غادي يكون هنا نهار تلات, إلا قدر
transl: I will see you and talk to you if I can be here on Tuesday, but I'm not sure.

eng: I was starved, and you know how hangry I get... I walked around for, like, an hour
darija_ar: كانت كانموت بجوع, راك عارفني كي كايجيني الجوع, بقيت تاندور شي ساعا تقريبان
transl: I used to feel like I was dying of hunger, you know when hunger strikes me, I start looking for food in about an hour.

eng: Studying the consequences of decisions that were taken in the past allows you to understand what the right decisions to make today!
darija_ar: ديراسا ديال لقارارات ليتخدات ف لماضي كاتخاليك تفهام لقارارات سحيحا ليخاس تاخودها ليوم
transl: Analyzing past decisions can help you understand the correct decisions to make today.

eng: After the second world war, the winners understood because of what it was that we didn't have to make the same mistake again.
darija_ar: مورا لحارب لعالامييا تانييا, عرفو لفاإزين بيلا ماخاسناش نعاودو نافس لغالات مرا خرا
transl: Instead of fighting each other, let's focus on improving ourselves so we don't have to compete for worthless things again.

eng: by recycling, being mindful of the ocean and finding new sources of energy
darija_ar: عان طاريق إعادا تادوير, أُ إدراك لموحيطاط أُ نلقاو ماصادير جديدا ديال طاقا
transl: Through recycling, we can contribute to preserving the environment and finding new energy sources.

eng: I would like to study more about the planet and how we can change our behaviour for the better
darija_ar: بغيت ناقرا كتار علا لكاوكاب أُ كيفاش نقادرو نبادلو سولوك ديالنا ل أفضال
transl: I want to read more about cognitive psychology to learn how we can change our behaviors for the better.

eng: I think we could just prepare it and serve with a little seaweed as it is a starter
darija_ar: كانضن يمكان لينا نصاوبوه أُ نقادموه معا شوييا ديال أعشاب لباحرييا كا بيدايا
transl: I think we can solve it if we approach it together with a little bit of herbal knowledge.

eng: Loubna spent ages showing me how to switch it on, charge it up, how to send emails
darija_ar: لوبنا دوزات زبّالا تلوقت كاتورّيني كيفاش نشعلو أُ نشارجيه أُ نصيفت لس إمايلس
transl: After searching for hours, I finally figured out how to charge my phone and connect it to my email.

eng: Why do I get the impression this is the first time you've mentioned anything going wrong between us?
darija_ar: علاش كانحسّ بلّي هادي أوال مرا لي كاتڭولي فيها شي حاجة واقعا بيناتنا?
transl: Why do I feel like this is the first time you're telling me something really between us?

eng: how about you get off your intellectual high-horse and get back to reality for a bit
darija_ar: أشبان ليك أناكا تاتخالا علا لعاود ديالك لفيكري أُتارجاع ل حاقيقا واهد شوييا
transl: Sometimes you need to reflect on your past in order to move forward and grow a little.

eng: There's one I know with lots of tattoos, a patch on his eye, and a parrot on his shoulder
darija_ar: كاين واهد كانعارفو فيه بزاف ديال لواشوم, زيف علا عينيه, أُباباغء علا كاتفو
transl: There is someone who is very knowledgeable about tattoos, he has them all over his body, even on his hands.

eng: Well, I'm gonna take a look at the decorations and call you back before the party
darija_ar: واخا أنا غادي نضرب طليلا علا دكور أُغادي نعاواد نتاسل بيك قبال لحفلا
transl: If I go to the market to buy groceries, I will meet you before the party.

eng: Can I have a sirloin steak with french fries and a side salad?
darija_ar: واش إمكان ليا نخاد شاريحا ديال لحم معا بتاتا ماقليا أُ شلاضا فجانب?
transl: Is it possible for me to buy a piece of meat without it being fried on the side?

eng: But when it comes to birdsong, I love the cheeky sound of the blackbird
darija_ar: والاكين ملي كايتعالاق لأمار بأغنيا ديال لعاسافير, أنا كانبغي صاوت ديال شاحرور سافيق
transl: When it comes to matters of love, I prefer the melody of a nightingale.

eng: or we can also invite the nurse that I ran into when I came in
darija_ar: أُ إمكن لينا التا نعاردو علا لفرمليا لي تساتحت معاها ملي كنت جاي"
transl: Maybe we can go back to the restaurant we had a good time at when you were here.

eng: So a long island for ma'am, and I'm going to look for Sasha and Daniel, don't move!
darija_ar: إوا جازيرا تويلا ل سيّدا, أُ غادي نقلّب علا صاسها أُ ضانيل, ماتحاركوش
transl: If the situation gets tough, I will switch to plan B, so don't worry.

eng: Ok, I'll have the fish and chips for starter and I'll get the burger later!
darija_ar: واخا, غادي ناخود لحوت أُ شيپس فلوول أُ غادي ناخود لبورڭر من باعد
transl: And then, we will have fish and chips first, and then we will have a burger afterwards.

eng: when I have a party for my birthday you may enjoy some different type of music
darija_ar: منين تكون عاندي حافلا ف عيد ميلادي, تقدار تاستامتاع بنوع ماختالاف من لموسيقا
transl: On my birthday, when you have a party, you can enjoy a different type of music.

eng: Do you have an idea of how long it took us to reach this point in the forest?
darija_ar: واش عاندك شي فيكرا شحال تلواقت خدينا باش نوصلو لهاد لبلاسا ف لغابا?
transl: Do you have any ideas on how many steps we need to take to reach this place in the forest?

eng: I wonder if they ever unionised against the dominant farmer upper class
darija_ar: كانتساأل إلا كانو التاحدو شي نهار داد تاباقا لعولييا تلموزاريعين لي واخدا كولشي
transl: I would ask if they had the homework on Sunday, but they said they had already done everything.

eng: let's fight the good fight and defend the rights of powerless people everywhere
darija_ar: خالونا نحاربو لحرب لمزيانا أُندافعو علا حوقوق ديال ناس لي ماڭادّينش فڭاع لبلايس
transl: Let's fight a good fight and defend the rights of people who are not able to defend themselves.

eng: And if we stay stuck here too long, we can still try blackberries
darija_ar: أُ إلا بقينا واحلين هنا بزاف ديال لوقت, إمكان لينا نجاربو توت لكحال
transl: If we stay here for a long time, we might as well try to adapt.

eng: but I still dont like flying, although when I see their smiling faces it is worth my stress
darija_ar: واكين مازال ماكانحمالش تاياران,واخا ملي كانشوف وجوه ديالهوم ضاحكين فلءمار كايستاحاق داك لعيا
transl: Even though he hasn't started studying yet, but when he sees his friends' happy faces at the café, he feels like he deserves a break.

eng: Can you get a GPS signal on your phone to find out where we are?
darija_ar: واش تقدار تلقا إشارا ديال ڭپص علا تيفون ديالك باش نعرفو فين حنا
transl: Can you find the signal of the GPS on your phone so we know where we are

eng: Someone said I was better than usual but I think they were just poking fun at me
darija_ar: ڭالييا شي حاد بيلا كنت حسان من قبال والاكين كانضن كانو كايداحكو علييا
transl: They came at me aggressively as if they were mocking me.

eng: Hi, this is my first time flying and I have to admit that I'm a bit nervous
darija_ar: أهلان, هادي لمرّا لاولا ليكانسافار فيها بطايارا أُ خاسني نعتارف بيلا ماتواتار شوييا
transl: Hello, this time was the first time I flew on a plane, it was a bit scary but I admit it was exciting.

eng: About the meat and fish, I'm also going to take a few things for vegetarians
darija_ar: داكشي ليكايتعالاق بلوحوم أُ لحوت, غادي ناخود شوييا ديال لحوايج خرين ل ناباتييين
transl: That thing related to whales or dolphins, we will take some other things for the party

eng: Sometimes we laugh at the grandmothers who drink chamomile, but I'll tell you one thing, I like it!
darija_ar: بعد لمرات كانداحكو علا لجدّات ليكايشربو لبابونج, والاكين غادي نڭوليك واحاد لحاجا, كايعجابني
transl: Sometimes they talk about the grandmothers who drink chamomile tea, otherwise I will tell you something, I like it.

eng: We will cover all the material up to next Tuesday, so start studying soon!
darija_ar: غادي نغاطيو ڭاع لماواد تال نهار تلات جاي, داكشي علاش بدا لقارايا باكري
transl: We will meet at the cafe when you come next Tuesday, that's why I want to start reading early.

eng: if you just trusted all of us to do our jobs we would be so much more effective
darija_ar: إلا كنتي كاتيق بينا كاملين أنّانا نديرو لخدما ديالنا غادي نكونو حسان عاماليان
transl: If you are with us completely in our work, we will be successful employees.

eng: don't forget, I know everything that this company has been doing for the past 10 years
darija_ar: ماتنساوش, راني عارف ڭاع داكشي ليكانت كاديرو هاد شاريكا هاد عشر سنين ليدازو
transl: Don't forget, I know that they have been doing this business for ten years now.

eng: do you enjoy socializing with a small group of friends or a large crowd?
darija_ar: كايعجبك تخدم معا فرقا سخيرا ولا شي ساحبك ولا بزّاف ديال نعاسّ ?
transl: Do you prefer working with a good team or being alone or too sleepy?

eng: i've started reading a new book, and it's already a rollercoaster of emotions
darija_ar: بديت لقرايا ديال واحد لقيسّا جديدا, وا ناري شحال من إحسّاسّ كايخليك تعيش
transl: Starting a new book is like starting a new journey, and the fire of emotions it ignites keeps you alive.

eng: i can't decide if i should get a dog or just keep collecting cute dog videos
darija_ar: ماعرفتش واش نشري شي كلب ولا نبقا خير نجمع ڤيدووات ديال كلاب سخيورين
transl: I don't know whether to buy a dog or to be better off collecting videos of funny dogs.

eng: can we talk about how different our parents' lives were at our age?
darija_ar: يمكن لينا ندويو علا شحال حايات واليدينا كانت مبدلا فاش كانو قدنا ?
transl: Maybe we can shed light on how things were different when they were with us.

eng: remember when we thought getting a driver's license was the ultimate freedom?
darija_ar: عقلتي فاش كان كيسحاب لينا إلا جبنا ل پرميس سافي أنعيشو لحوريا ?
transl: Did you think he was going to help us unless we brought the homework?

eng: is there a place you like going to when feeling uneasy ?
darija_ar: واش عندك شي بلاسّا كاتمشي ليها فاش كاتحسّ براسّك ماشي هوا هاداك ?
transl: Do you have a place you go to when you feel overwhelmed, not just any place?

eng: have you ever wondered if our parents have a favorite between us?
darija_ar: عمرك ختر ليك فبالك إلا شي واحد فينا عزيز كتر عند واليدينا ?
transl: Have you ever thought of anything other than yourself that is more precious to us than our own hands?

eng: could you let me know if there's a promotion on cleaning supplies this week?
darija_ar: ت قدر تشوف لييا واش كاين شي سولد فلپرودوييات تنديف هاد سيمانا ?
transl: Can you check if there is a sale on electronics this week for me?

eng: let's have a cozy night in, just the two of us, with our favorite comfort food
darija_ar: يالّاه ندوزو شي ليلا ناديا خير أنا وياك معا لماكلا لي كانموتو عليها
transl: Let's go out one night, it's better for both of us to go eat what we crave.

eng: what's your opinion on taking a class together to learn a new skill?
darija_ar: أش بان ليك ناخدو شي حيسّاسّ مجموعين باش نتعلمو شي حاجا جديدا ?
transl: What do you think if we take a collective decision to learn something new?

eng: what's your opinion on starting a hobby together, like drawing or painting?
darija_ar: أش بان ليك نبداو نديرو شي هيوايا جديدا بحال راسم ولا سباغا ?
transl: What do you think if we start doing a new activity like hiking or fishing?

eng: can you talk about the strategies your team employed to exploit the opponent's weaknesses?
darija_ar: تقدر تشرح لينا لخوتا لي درتوها باش تستاخلو نيقات دعف ديال لخاسم ?
transl: Can you explain to us the steps you took to solve the problem?

eng: can you discuss the impact of crowd support and how it affects your performance?
darija_ar: أش عندك ماتڭول علا لموسنادا ديال لجمهور و كيفاش كاتعوانكوم فلأداء ديالكوم ?
transl: What do you have to say about the support of the audience and how does it affect your performance?

eng: how do you handle the pressure of representing your club and its history on the field?
darija_ar: كيفاش كاتعامل معا لپرسّينڭ ديال تمتيل ديال فرقا كبيرا عندها تاريخ كبير ?
transl: How do you deal with a person who has a significant age difference and a different background?

eng: the opponent's goalkeeper made some incredible saves, but we persevered
darija_ar: لحاريسّ ديال لخسّم حبسّ شي كواري وا بزّاف والاكين درنا دكشي لي علينا
transl: We bought a lot of vegetables and fruits from the market, now we need to prepare what we have.

eng: absolutely it's like a reminder to slow down and appreciate the nature around us
darija_ar: داروري بحالا بخينا نتفكرو كيفاش نتكالماو و نبقاو نشوفو فتابيعا لي دايرا بينا
transl: Of course, we need to think about how to communicate and see the solutions to the issues between us.
